verbose_text: Although much work has been carried out on determining the effects of Hsp90 phosphorylation, the phosphatases that act on Hsp90 to regulate phosphorylation are not well characterized, although yeast Ppt1 [PP5 (protein phosphatase 5) in humans], positively regulates Hsp90 activity through dephosphorylation [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
